content.title: Sunrise MEP Engineering & Construction Pte Ltd
content.text: To take on major projects tendered for by the Singapore government. It has the required professional qualifications, necessary registrations, a width and depth of experience and an appropriately skilled workforce to undertake such projects. It guarantees satisfaction.
